elements.label: Workspace
elements.helpText:
Select a folder to be used as your workspace. If the folder you select does not exist, it will be created for you.

This folder will contain the rasters produced by this model. If datasets already exist in this folder, they will be overwritten.

elements.label: Finfish Farm Location
elements.helpText:
A GIS polygon or point dataset, with a latitude and longitude value and a numerical identifier for each farm. File can be named anything, but no spaces in the name
File type: polygon shapefile or .gdb
Rows: each row is a specific netpen or entire aquaculture farm
Columns: columns contain attributes about each netpen (area, location, etc.).
Sample data set: \InVEST\Aquaculture\Input\Finfish_Netpens.shp
